Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 6 Piercing plus 4 Poison and can poison
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Claw, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 7 Slashing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Ettercap makes 2 attacks, one with its Bite and one with its Claws
Other Actions.Action 2: Web, Ranged Weapon Attack, Range: 30/60ft, On a hit, the Ettercap restrains the creature with webbing

Abilities.Ability 1: Spider Climb, The Ettercap can climb on difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.  Why tf is this thing just a giant spider that can choke people with a web garrote lmao
Abilities.Ability 2: Web Sense, While in contact with a web, the Ettercap knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the web.  It's just a spider
Abilities.Ability 3: Web Walker, The Ettercap ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.  Seriously, it's just a humanoid spider.  What is this from
